name: OVO Smash!
description: What happens when Memory Match meets Deathmatch? OVO Smash!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.5 Ghz (Intel Celeron / AMD Athlon 64 x2) Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD Radeon DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.4 Ghz (Intel Core i5 / AMD Phenom II) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8000+ / Radeon HD 5000+ DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
